caption: Table 1: Comparison of video generation results. Results are grouped by the type of generative models. The scores for MAGVIT-AR and MAGVIT-v2-AR are taken from the appendix of MAGVIT-v2 (Yu et al., 2023b). LARP-L-Long denotes the LARP-L trained for more epochs. Our best results are obtained with a larger AR generator.
description: Table 1 compares the performance of LARP with other state-of-the-art video generation methods across different categories of models, highlighting LARP's superior performance on UCF-101 and K600 benchmarks.

caption: Table 2: Ablation study. All configurations are modified from LARP-B model.
description: Table 2 shows the ablation study of LARP, demonstrating the impact of different components on the model's performance in video reconstruction and generation.
